articles.title: India Tops Global List for New Stroke Cases Lancet Study Reveals | TheHealthSite.com - TheHealthSite
articles.description: Stroke is a leading global cause of death and India experienced around 13 lakh new stroke cases in 2019 the highest in the World Health Organization's Southeast Asia Region. TheHealthSite.com
articles.content:
Adopting a healthy lifestyle can significantly lower the risk of stroke.
